commit message: Update web page for release v1.7.
Fix onCompletion bug, add second Makefile.
Validate URLs, don't reconnect to local media.
Check for valid URLs in playlists.
Change state/dim -> state/duck, only suspend network URLs.
Only restart on error, not completion.
Add M3u8 playlist support (for BBC Media Connector).
Hide notification if clicked to stop.
